meanings.definition: Emitting an extremely high amount of light.
meanings.sent1: The ultraluminous stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight was ultraluminous, making it easy to see in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The ultraluminous glow of the fireflies made them look like tiny lanterns.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as ultraluminous as a beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The ultraluminous neon sign attracted customers from far away.

meanings.sent1: The ultraluminous sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: The ultraluminous diamond sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The ultraluminous disco ball made the room feel like a party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as ultraluminous as a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The ultraluminous smile on his face brightened up the whole room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an intense brightness or luminosity.
meanings.sent1: The ultraluminous fireworks painted the sky with colors.
meanings.sent2: The ultraluminous moonlight illuminated the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The ultraluminous glow of the fireflies made the garden magical.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as ultraluminous as the stars on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The ultraluminous glow of the city skyline was breathtaking.
